programme.title: Wrongful Conviction
programme.desc: It’s estimated that roughly 10,000 people are wrongfully convicted in the U.S. each and every year for crimes they didn’t commit. These wrongful convictions mean that the real perpetrators may still be out there and that we all lose when the criminal justice system we rely on becomes corrupt.

programme.title: One Small Step
programme.desc: Oftentimes climate change and pollution can seem like unfathomably difficult problems to solve. Out host’s goal is to calm those fears by inviting the audience along with her as she strives to learn how to take action against the problems plaguing our planet. In One Small Step we explore how recycling works, where our waste goes, and how we can fix the planet through our actions as individuals. Hosted by Lucy Biggers, a growing influencer in the sustainability space.

programme.title: Seeing The Beginning Of Time
programme.desc: Astronomers have begun one of the most far-reaching efforts to study the cosmos. They are forging giant new telescopes, while marshaling vast computational power. These technologies are part of a historic quest: to peer into space and time, to find out how the universe gave birth to galaxies and planets, to discern the amazing world of gravity and test theories by Einstein and other scientists.

programme.title: The World's Most Powerful Telescopes
programme.desc: Discover the technology behind the world’s most powerful telescopes. Featuring interviews with leading scientists at the European Southern Observatory, and 4K HDR space photography, uncover how instruments four billion times more sensitive than the human eye are revolutionizing our understanding of the cosmos.

programme.title: Earth in 1000 Years
programme.desc: There are signs that Earth's great stores of ice on Greenland and Antarctica are beginning to melt in the wake of rising sea surface temperatures. With sea levels beginning to rise, scientists are looking back at past geological ages to understand the influence of ocean currents and other factors. They are searching for insights into where our planet may be headed 1000 into the future and beyond.

programme.title: Dive To Tiger Central
programme.desc: When tiger sharks gather in great numbers off the coast of South Africa in the summer, it's time to get out of the water, but for shark expert Mark Addison, it's a chance to continue his life’s work. Free diving without chain mail or a cage, Mark puts his life on the line in an effort to reveal the true nature of these sharks, debunking the myth that they are nothing more than notorious killers.

programme.title: Tooth and Claw S5:E12 "Calling For Bobcats - Bobcat Hunting"

programme.title: Tooth and Claw S5:E13 "Coyote Quad - Coyote Hunting"
programme.desc: Coyote Quad!!! That's right! 4 coyotes go down on the same stand! Join Jon Collins and Corey Hager on an unforgettable hunt in central Kentucky.

programme.title: Tooth and Claw S5:E14 "Deer Vs Coyotes"
programme.desc: Right here is something you don't see everyday! On this hunt Jon Collins finds 2 coyotes harassing a whitetail deer. Watch to see how this hunt unfolds!

programme.title: Tooth and Claw S5:E15 "Following Coyote Tracks"
programme.desc: On this hunt Jon Collins and Zeke Nantz are making a bobcat stand, but while walking in they discover coyote tracks everywhere. Let's see what comes to the call.

programme.title: Tooth and Claw S5:E16 "River Bottom Coyote"
programme.desc: This is the second stand of the morning for Jon Collins and Zeke Nantz. The first stand produced a hard charging coyote. Let's see what rolls out on the second stand.

programme.title: TRP S4:E26 Marty Stouffer - Wild America
programme.desc: Marty Stouffer joins the podcast today to tell us about his television success. Marty had a show on PBS called Wild America that became the most viewed series on all of PBS. He focused on animals of all sizes in his show, from large game, all the way down to salamanders and mice. Marty has a ton of stories that he shares in the show today, so be sure to tune in for the full episode! Marty was a suggestion by a listener. If you have suggestions for guests, text me at 305-930-7346

programme.title: Limitless S1:E1 "Lake Okeechobee - MLF Pro Circuit"

programme.title: WPT Greatest Season 2 Episode 2
programme.desc: WPT Greatest Tales from the Felt takes a look back at the most legendary final tables in WPT history. On this episode, we revisit the final table at season four’s, Five Diamond World Poker Classic from Bellagio in Las Vegas. This final table was tough and featured Doyle Brunson, JJ Liu, Patrik Antonious, the “Unabomber” Phil Laak, and “Gigabet” Darrel Dickens. The amateur at the table was Rehne Pederson who got in off of $100 online tournament. They are all competing for a chance to win over 2 million dollars. With a star studded final table the competition is tough and the poker player is some of the best ever at a WPT final table.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Vinnie Montez - Armed and Hilarious

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Tommy Drake - Mouse
programme.desc: Tommy’s unique mixture of original material delivered in a classic style has given him the opportunity to do more shows and be seen by more people live than just about any other comic on the planet.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Bill Boronkay - You Can Do Better
programme.desc: Sarcastic and self-deprecating, Bill Boronkay jokes about being too ugly to work for ESPN, dating out of his tax bracket, and how society is centered around parents.

programme.title: David Dyer - Further Along Than Anyone Expected
programme.desc: David Dyer has been performing at stand-up at comedy clubs and corporate events for over twenty years. He’s worked with some of the best comics in the industry including Mike Birbiglia, Jim Breuer, and Lewis Black. He’s been a contributing writer to NBC’s Late Night with Jimmy Fallon and ABC’s Politically Incorrect. He’s a regular on the nationally syndicated Bob and Tom Show and often appears on the roster for their “Friends of The Bob and Tom Show” comedy tour. He’s the host of a new web series called Sidecar Sessions where he interviews guests who are sitting in the sidecar of his motorcycle as David pilots the bike around town. David also created and stars in another web series called Pillars with co-star, Kevin Yon. David became an on-call firefighter with Grand Rapids Township in Michigan….his wife is nervous.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Dan St. Paul - Mockin' the Suburbs
programme.desc: Thirty year comedy veteran Dan St. Paul jokes about acting his age, his Italian heritage, and slowly becoming a cylinder the older he gets.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Chris Cope - Baby Face
programme.desc: Chris Cope, a Florida transplant now living in LA. The city has been good to Chris in just 4 short years he's appeared on Jimmy Kimmel Live, Tosh.O, Laughs on Fox. He's acted in feature films and also appeared on the hit ABC TV Show "Grey's Anatomy".

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Lamuweri Guluka - The First Option
programme.desc: Lamuweri Guluka is an African name meaning “hard to pronounce on the first try.” Lam is a seasoned comedian who has performed at colleges, comedy clubs, and cafes all over the country whose background as a nerdy, suburban, black male gives him a unique comedic perspective that audiences love.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Dylan Mandlsohn - Cruising America

programme.desc: From the first signs of spring until the cold Michigan winter takes hold, Mackinac Island is an incredible place to visit. programme.title: Trolland
programme.desc: Fenn the Troll hates the Troll pastime of pranking, and is teased so much for it that he runs away. But when a long-suffering park ranger starts capturing the other Trolls, it's up to Fenn to rescue his family and friends - without pranking.

programme.title: War of the Worlds
programme.desc: Astronomer George Herbert (C. Thomas Howell) is assigned to investigate reports of strange meteors crashing into earth near New York, Los Angeles and Washington, D.C. As the meteors land, enormous multi-limbed metal creatures disembark and begin destroying everything and everyone in their path with heat-ray guns. Amidst the apocalyptic destruction, Herbert teams with a soldier (Andy Lauer) and a pastor (Rhett Giles) on his journey into Washington to reunite with his family.

programme.title: 40 Days and Nights
programme.desc: When a colossal tectonic shift causes the sea level to start rising, a microbiologist gathers the DNA of as many species as she can, while the military creates an "ark" in a desperate attempt to preserve life on Earth.

programme.title: Android Cop
programme.desc: In this futuristic, action-packed thriller, a cop and his robotic partner enter the Zone, a forbidden section of the city inhabited by a disease-stricken populace. Together, they discover the real reason everyone is sick, and attempt to stop the illness - with the help of the machine's powerful technology and weaponry.

programme.title: Battle of Los Angeles
programme.desc: In February 1942 US forces engaged an unidentified flying object above Los Angeles. Now almost 70 years later, the alien invaders have returned.

programme.title: CarGo
programme.desc: A young car learns the importance of family when he embarks on a mission to rescue his father - who's been sent to Clunker Island to be repurposed as junk metal.

programme.title: Phenomenon: The Lost Archives, S1 E2 | Up for Sale
programme.desc: Take a closer look at the launch of Sputnik, the unpaid workers, and the mass exodus of Russian rocket scientists to unfriendly nations interested in developing weapons of mass destruction.

programme.title: Phenomenon: The Lost Archives, S1 E3 | H.A.A.R.P.: Holes in Heaven?
programme.desc: The brainchild of controversial Nikola Tesla, High-Frequency Active Aural Research Project (H.A.A.R.P.) is a combined effort of the Air Force and Navy ostensibly designed to influence the weather.

programme.title: Phenomenon: The Lost Archives, S1 E4 | American Midnight
programme.desc: In a small Arkansas town, two young men are found dead on the train tracks. Upon investigation, it becomes unclear whether they were hit by the train, or were the operators of a major drug ring.

programme.title: Phenomenon: The Lost Archives, S1 E6 | Heavy Watergate: The War Against Cold Fusion
programme.desc: In 1989, two respected chemists made an announcement that rocked the world of science. Their experiments with heavy water yielded enormous amounts of heat energy, now known as cold fusion.

programme.title: Phenomenon: The Lost Archives, S1 E7 | Noah's Ark Found?
programme.desc: In 1960, a joint US-Turkish expedition sets out to investigate the aerial sighting of a boat-shaped object located in eastern Turkey. Could this be the mortal remains of the legendary Noah's Ark?

programme.title: Phenomenon: The Lost Archives, S1 E8 | Monopoly Men
programme.desc: Thought by many to be a government organization maintained to provide financial accountability in the event of a domestic depression, the actual business of the FED is shrouded in secrecy.

programme.title: Phenomenon: The Lost Archives, S1 E9 | Lost Lightning: The Missing Secrets of Nikola Tesla
programme.desc: At the end of the 19th century, a race was on to power the world. Caught in the crossfire was inventor Nikola Tesla, who claimed he could provide everyone with free, unlimited energy. Was it true?

programme.title: Phenomenon: The Lost Archives, S1 E10 | Tunguska: The Russian Roswell
programme.desc: Just prior to the Russian Revolution, a mysterious explosion occurred in the desolate northlands of Siberia. Was it an asteroid? Or could it have been the explosion of an extraterrestrial craft?

programme.title: Phenomenon: The Lost Archives, S1 E11 | Stolen Glory: The Cover-up of Cosmonaut Vladimir Ilyushin
programme.desc: With the collapse of communism and the rise of freedom in the Russian Federation, recent access to documents in the Kremlin archives reveal a story intended to remain buried forever.

programme.title: Trap for Cinderella
programme.desc: A young girl suffering from amnesia after surviving a house fire begins a tormented road to recovery.

programme.title: The Little Girl Who Lives Down the Lane
programme.desc: 13-year-old Rynn Jacobs (Jodie Foster) lives alone in a high-class Quebec town. Unknown to the neighbors, she is leading a secret and dangerous life. With Martin Sheen.

programme.title: The Great Mint Swindle
programme.desc: Three Australian brothers become embroiled in a scam after selling a fake gold nugget to a ruthless tycoon.

programme.title: Broken Star
programme.desc: Abandoned by her family, starlet Markey Marlowe is sequestered in a duplex with a reclusive landlord.

programme.title: Sprinter
programme.desc: A Jamaican teen burdened by family troubles hopes his rise in track and field can reunite him with his mother.

programme.title: Dossier K
programme.desc: This hard-hitting crime thriller follows two Belgian police detectives as they clash with the Albanian mob and the corrupt ties it has with their department. Subtitled.

programme.title: On the Edge
programme.desc: When a young basketball player becomes entangled with drug dealers, he turns to an ex-cop and former private eye. Starring Ice-T, Gary Busey, Fred Williamson and Jim Brown.

programme.title: Atomic Twister
programme.desc: This film traces a day in the lives of small-town citizens who find themselves facing mass destruction.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: A deadly virus threatens to wipe out an entire Rocky Mountain town, forcing the town doctor (Steven Seagal) to escape the soldiers who enforce the town's quarantine and devise a cure.

programme.title: Firepower
programme.desc: Two undercover cops risk it all by going deep inside a federally sanctioned haven of gambling, prostitution, drugs and violence, to bring down a psychotic criminal mastermind.

programme.title: Night Partners
programme.desc: Two California housewives (Yvette Mimieux, Diana Canova) work with the police as their city's first "victim assistance unit."

programme.title: The Cisco Kid

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
